sense.def:
Kadar moški
shaves
, si z britvijo odstrani dlake z obraza.

seg.quote: When he had shaved and dressed, he went down to the kitchen.
He had a shave and a bath.

sense.def:
To shave a part of one's body
pomeni z britvijo si odstraniti vse dlake z določenega dela telesa.

cit.quote: za las je šlo, malo je manjkalo
